album_inspiration: This Album is about traveling in defferent countries seeing new places and resorst and meeting new people and experiencing new cultures and cuisines.
While at the same time engoting new ski resorts going down the new slopes and terains
This album describes the experience in european countries and the experience in the mountains and the experience in the snowboarding resorts.
Countries like France, Italy, Germany, Austria, Switzerland, etc.
A lot is about meeting new people and experiencing new cultures and cuisines.
